ComicInfo.Summary:
SURE, Earth may have been consumed by the Nothing, and a freak accident killed the ONLY being who could have possibly stopped it, and yes, the Cult of Nothing’s armada is on its way, but look at the bright side... I’m sure it’s here somewhere... right?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Darick Robertson (a) & Karen Holloway (c) | 1 | B | Cover B | Connie Daidone | 2 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Variant Cover | Darick Robertson | 3 | *Notes:* The Cover A and the 1:10 Retailer Incentive Variant Cover are a homage of the movie poster for Indiana Jones and The Raiders of The Lost Ark.
